channel.title: 🏢 Graduate School of AI, KAIST on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Graduate School of AI, KAIST on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DASH: Warm-Starting Neural Network Training in Stationary Settings without Loss of Plasticity
item.description: DASH combats neural network training’s plasticity loss during warm-starting by selectively forgetting memorized noise while preserving features, improving accuracy and efficiency.
